search.query: index=* source="stream:Splunk_HTTPURI" uri_path!="" | rename count as counts, uri_path as URI, sum(time_taken) as time_taken | eval error=if(status>=400, counts, 0) | stats sum(counts) as Count sum(error) as Errors sum(time_taken) as TimeTaken by URI | sort Count desc | eval "Avg. Response Time"=(TimeTaken/Count)/(1000*1000) | fields - TimeTaken

index=* source="stream:Splunk_HTTPURI" site!="" | rename count as counts, sum(bytes_in) as bytes_in | stats sum(counts) as Count sum(bytes_in) as "Bytes In" sum(sum(bytes_out)) as "Bytes Out" by site | rename site as Domain | sort by Count desc

index=* source="stream:Splunk_HTTPClient" | rename count as Count, c_ip as Client, sum(time_taken) as time_taken, sum(bytes_in) as bytes_in, sum(bytes_out) as bytes_out | stats sum(Count) as Requests , sum(time_taken) as TimeTaken, sum(bytes_in) as "Bytes In" , sum(bytes_out) as "Bytes Out" by Client | sort Requests desc | eval "Response Time"=(TimeTaken/Requests)/(1000*1000) | fields - TimeTaken
